      • checkPair

        public static <T> void checkPair(T p1,
                 T p2)
                      throws java.lang.Throwable
        check whether the two parameter match each other.

        If parameter 1 is null/-1, parameter 2 should be null/-1. And if parameter 1 is not null/-1, parameter 2 should not be null/-1; Otherwise, it will throw an exception

        参数:
        p1 -
        p2 -
        抛出:
        java.lang.Throwable

      • getFinalSignalResult

        public static int getFinalSignalResult(int[] results)
        get the final result via checking list of sampling results
        参数:
        results -
        返回:
        WifiModel.SIGNAL_STATE_VALID, WifiModel.SIGNAL_STATE_INVALID, WifiModel.SIGNAL_STATE_NONE
